name: Jlmfreelancejobs
body:
http://www.thefrontendlab.com/front-end-developer-with-an-insatiable-hunger-to-learn-and-progress-c-234-p-934

Front-end Developer with an insatiable hunger to learn & progress

You are looking for a workplace where people invest in your development and growth?

 

Then you need to read further!

 

This is a company which spends more than 3000€ per employee on training and development

Personal and professional growth is crucial for them and one way to make their employees happy ;)

You will be paid conference participation, but you also have a lot of in-house activities to share knowledge

peer code reviews
discussions of case studies
mentoring by a senior developer
 

If you feel that there is still room to grow and you are eager to learn, please get in touch. This job will help you step up with your coding skills in Javascript, angularJS, html5, css3.

 

Let’s have a coffee to discuss details grit@thefrontendlab.com

 

Front-end Developer Job, Javascript, html5, css3, angularJS, March 2015

http://www.thefrontendlab.com/web-developer-junior-web-developer-with-passion-for-mobile-c-234-p-887

Web Developer Vacature, Web Developer Job, html5, css3, jQuery, Javascript, PHP, Phonegap, responsive web design, API, Facebook app, twitter bootstrap, web development, web developer passion

 

If you are looking to join a really cool start-up and have lots of freedom to bring in your ideas to improve their product, this is your chance!

 

This start-up is looking for young, energetic web developers who are eager to learn and want to be trained. If you are looking to improve your programming skills on the backend and frontend, the Lead Web developer will give you all his support to help you grow.

 

Whilst they help you progress your career, you help them improve their mobile web app. You are young, love digital and have a lot of ideas how to improve user experience and the interface. Feel free to come up with ideas to attract more users to hit the 2 million user’s mark

 

Benefits in a nutshell

Face to face trainings with our Lead Web Developer
Conference participation paid (also abroad)
Informal working environment in an international, mutli-cultural team
Summer party including go-kart, bowling and drinking ;)
  

This sounds like the perfect workplace?

If you bring passion for web development, curiosity, eagerness to learn and lots of energy you have almost fulfilled what we need.
To have a good training basis to make you a brilliant web developer we need a good basis of html5, css3, jQuery, PHP.
You have some nice responsive websites and projects to show?
An IT-related study (min. HBO) is beneficial!
 

Get in touch grit@thefrontendlab.com, I would love to get to know YOU!

 

Web Developer Vacature, Web Developer Job, html5, css3, jQuery, Javascript, PHP, Phonegap, responsive web design, API, Facebook app, twitter bootstrap, web development,web developer passion

How to Apply
Click the Apply button below to email your CV to us.

Apply


http://www.thefrontendlab.com/junior-frontend-developer-are-you-looking-for-the-best-training-in-the-business-c-234-p-1292-b-55

http://www.thegiglab.com/junior-php-developer-vacancy-amsterdam-top-training-and-development-with-international-atmosphere-2500-3000-c-234-p-769

Junior PHP Developer Vacancy Amsterdam: Top Training & Development with international atmosphere (2500-3000€)

unior PHP Developer Vacancy Amsterdam: Top Training & Development with international atmosphere (2500-3000€)

 

Junior PHP Developer Vacancy Amsterdam

 

If you like start-up atmosphere and want to help us shape our business, we are happy to have a chat with you!

 

We exist since 1,5 year, but due to our immense success we already managed to open up a new office in the UK and US on top of our Amsterdam headquarter.

 

Currently, we are a team of 8 people, looking to hire several employees to grow our team. We are looking for smart people who come up with ideas and are open for innovation. Amsterdam is a city with cultural variety and we would like our team as divers as possible – multidisciplinary and international.

 

We want to give junior developers the chance to get a rocket career start.

 

If you have PHP skills and are familiar with Codeigniter, Symphony or Laravel that would be great

A solid basis in programming is needed, knowledge of frameworks is a plus

An understanding for user-experience and basics in html5, css3 and jQuery are also required

You have your own Github account and experiment with new technologies at home?

That’s the type of person we are looking for

 

We will train you and help you progress with your skills.

Get face-to-face trainings and be monitored by our lead developer.

 

Benefits in a nutshell

·       Flexible working hours

·       Training & development, new technologies, face to face trainings, conference participation paid

·       Informal working environment in an international team

·       Autonomy and the freedom to bring in ideas

We would love to hear from enthusiastic and passionate developers who cannot wait to start their programming career.

Get in touch talent@thefrontendlab.com
Junior Frontend Developer - Are you looking for the best training in the business?

This vacancy is simple. If you are a Junior Frontend Developer and want to have the best training in the business, you should apply via nick@thefrontendlab.com

This company want people like a sponge. Willingness to learn. The directors and managers love people who have a passion and desire to learn. You will be provided with the best possible training and development out there. The mentality is they want people they can train & develop. So enthusiasm, energy is critical to show. Especially at this level when you are a junior looking to get your first job or first real development opportunity.

Our client is the most awarded agency in the Netherlands. You should also take note that the majority of their FWA awards have been awarded in the last year or so. So this is an agency really pushing forward, really in the news and delivering high quality work.

I know it is a cliché but this is 100% not a 9 to 5 job. They want people who want to build super awesome stuff. If that’s what you want this is the place to be for sure! Because of the deadlines there will be long hours involved and they want people, who after a touch day at work, go home and build something for themselves!!! ;). The directors are being interviewed by hundreds of people. Don't miss these guys at the SxSW Festival!

Company

There is an awesome relationship between creative and technology. This is one of the biggest selling points as there is huge respect between the creative team and tech team. Everything is discussed openly throughout projects to deliver the most outstanding experiences for clients as possible.

The amount of awards (and maybe more importantly how recently they are happening) shows the quality of work you will be delivering. It will also allow you to be proud the work you deliver will be seen by millions and recognized by the global awarding associations

There is no better company to develop. Here you will have the best training. Apply now via nick@thefrontendlab.com

How to Apply
Click the Apply button below to email your CV to us.

http://www.thefrontendlab.com/committed-frontend-developer-eager-growing-into-a-lead-role-3500-5000-c-234-p-1169

Committed Frontend Developer eager growing into a Lead role! (3500-5000€)

AmsterdamPermanent3500-5000€
Angular.jsExperienceddesign patternstddMVCAmazing Javascript TeamCompany Car
Apply
OR

Import form LinkedIn
An employer that cares for your individual professional growth is hard to find?

>>> Let me help you!

 

What do you think of that?

Mentor program – have an in-house mentor by your side who will give you impulses and teach you the latest technologies
Directors who map our your Frontend Developer career plan for the entire year, who monitor your progress monthly to push your career into the right direction
In-house case studies and meetups with internationally known speakers
Team up to go to conferences no matter where in the world
 

Together with this ****awesome training & career package**** comes

A permanent contract
Over-average salary + bonus + car
Shares are the cherry on top
Social events with the team and family
 

Your role will be a dedicated Frontend Developer role, where you purely focus on Frontend projects.

Javascript, angularJS, emberJS, knockoutJS, reactJS, pure MVC will be the most used tech of your toolsbox. Testing, continuous integration and responsive web design will be in the mix too.

 

You get the opportunity to grow into a Lead Frontend developer role and look back at an ***awesome career.

 

Don’t miss your chance, if you are a committed Frontend developer who wants to push the boundaries of Frontend development.

 

Get in touch grit@thefrontendlab.com

 

Javascript, angularJS, html5, css3, angular.js, MVC, Lead Frontend Developer, continuous integration, AJAX, JSON, tdd, March 2015

How to Apply

http://www.thefrontendlab.com/angularjs-developer-focus-and-become-an-expert-in-angularjs-3000-3800-c-234-p-1170

AngularJS Developer – Focus and become an expert in AngularJS! (3000-3800€)

AmsterdamPermanent3000-3800€
HTML5CSS3Angular.jsJavascriptExperiencedResponsive Web DesignbootstrapMVCAwesome Career Progression
Apply
OR

Import form LinkedIn
***Addicted to angularJS?***


Great, you are the right person for us!

 

We are looking for a dedicated AngularJS developer, who wants to improve his skills and be trained by an excellent Javascript Lead Developer.

You will be developing digital solutions for companies in the FinTech industry.

 

The biggest plus of this job is the team. The lead developer is a highly experience Javascript Developer, who knows the in’s and out’s of Javascript, MV* frameworks and testing. He is dedicated to his profession and is eager to support his peers in learning the latest technologies. At the moment the focus is AngularJS.

 

What else do you get?

“Feel at home” like office, which space to work, lunch and kicker ;)
Develop award-winning Software
Work with the latest technology and get the chance to become a real expert in your field
Learn about IT security, accessibility and performance whilst serving Top Dutch Companies such as ING, Deloitte and ABN Amro
 

If you are looking for a place to learn, an environment full of impulses and innovation, then you need to apply!

Take your chance – grit@thefrontendlab.com

 

Javascript, angularJS, gulp, grunt, nodeJS, MVC, continuous integration, testing, OOP, responsive web design, html, css, March 2015

How to Apply
Click the Apply button below to email your CV to us.

Apply
OR

Import form LinkedIn

Frontend Developer Job – F2F Trainings with the Lead Developer & Knowledge-sharing (2500-3500€)

AmsterdamPermanent2500-3500€
Apply
OR

Import form LinkedIn
 If you are looking to work in an absolutely fun environment, get in touch!

 

This international frontend team is organizing in-house hackathons every month. To have some fun from now and then they have a kicker round in the afternoon. You better be good, otherwise you end up on the wall of shame :)

 

Currently the team exists of 5 frontend developers and a tester. However they are looking to grow the team by 5 more frontend developer to have two big in-house teams. Starting as a frontend developer you can grow into a senior or lead frontend developer role or scrum master position. To support your career the lead developer will support you with face to face trainings. Also the entire team is a big fan of knowledge sharing. Everybody has another interest – angularJS, responsiveness, user-interface design. Apart from that fun things like in-house hackathons are organized regularly.

 

If you are looking for a super cool career step, where your progress will be monitored and supported by the Lead Front-end Developer, you need to reply.

 

This is the package waiting for you:

In-house hackathons and kicker afternoon
A front-end team of experts
36 days holiday
Bonus system
Collective health insurance + pension
Employee discount on our products
 

Ready to take a step up in your career as a Front-end Developer?

Happy to hear from you grit@thefrontendlab.com

March2015

http://www.thefrontendlab.com/frontend-developer-job-f2f-trainings-with-the-lead-developer-and-knowledge-sharing-2500-3500-c-234-p-1106

http://www.thefrontendlab.com/you-love-to-develop-rich-expressive-apps-with-angularjs-c-250-p-939

You love to develop rich, expressive apps with angularJS?

RotterdamPermanent3000-4000€
Apply
OR

Import form LinkedIn
We are a fast growing company. Within 1 year we grew from 4 to 12 people.

The development team consists of 4 backend developers and 1 frontend developer. Since a lot of work on the frontend needs to be done – we need your help!

Currently our focus is to really improve the quality of our application. So if you have interest in testing or bring experience with Karma, Selenium or similar, this would be awesome.

 

We work with scrum and 2 week sprints. Every 3 months a new version of our application is released. On one hand we need to improve the features that are already developed, but we constantly develop new features our clients ask for. Since we develop a very rich application, robustness and maintainability are crucial. Our clients work for the government so security is an equally hot topic for us.

 

What’s it like to work with us?

We have regular code reviews in the team to improve the quality
Open source is what we love
We have lunch together and sit around a big table in our office kitchen
If you like drinks you are welcome to join us
 

We would love to hear from front-end developers with awareness for quality code especially knowledge on testing.

Strong Javascript skills are key, MVC framework experience if possible angularJS is beneficial.

 

If you think that’s you, get in touch!
grit@thefrontendlab.com


Click the Apply button below to email your CV to us.
http://www.thefrontendlab.com/
